Package employees

Class Employee

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • employees.Employee
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, IEmployee
    public class Employee
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements IEmployee
    The implementation of an employee. He/she is described by his/her first name, last name, identifier, password and email.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Employee()
      Empty constructor
      Employee​(java.lang.String id)
      Creates an employee given his/her identifier (default password, default mail).
      Employee​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String userid, java.lang.String pwd, java.lang.String email)
      Creates an employee given his/her first name, last name, identifier, password and email.
